channel.title: Hyper cam 2!
channel.description:
Okay, I know this is the wrong forum, but I'm not sure where to put this one =\
I just downloaded Hypercam 2, but when I went to test it, it lagged my comp to where I had to restart it with my server running.
I logged onto RuneScape because I knew my friend had made tons of pking vids using Hypercam2, and I had her check how much ram was in her comp, she only had 512mb, I have 1gb of ram and hers doesn't lag at all, mine laggs horribly.
Any help..?

@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Rs, hey, it’s Sk8erdude995 from RS, remember me? Cooking outside edge bank in W11? and thanks, gonna try that now.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2007, 05:39:13 PM[/size][hr]YAY!!! It worked man!!! Thanks a bunch!

item.title: Hyper cam 2!
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Allright,Right click on your desktop>properties>settings>Advanced>then click on the tab Troubleshoot,there should be a bar-Turn it to none.hit okay,You should be back at the settings tab,make the color quality 16bit(medium)Prevents lag with Hypercam

Read full topic

item.title: Hyper cam 2!
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

I have plenty of ram still left on my comp, and no I don’t have a virus, I run 3 scans a day. I tried Hypercam when I only had 512mb of ram, and it did the same thing so I figured it was just the ammount of ram, but I just got some more ram and the exact same thing happened. =\

EDIT:Oh, yeah, mine isn’t licensed, but either is my friends. That shouldn’t be the reason =\

But maybe it is.

EDIT#2:I just check the setting in my AVI tab and theer the exact same. =\

Read full topic

item.title: Hyper cam 2!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

don’t run hypercam too long. Stop the video every 40 seconds or so cuz all the video is uncompressed and 10 seconds is like 1 MB of ram before. When you click stop it dumps all the ram data into a file cleaning your ram again u could change ur settings.

mines don’t lag my settings are in AVI File tab

Rate in Frames per Second, Record [10] Playback: [10]
Cursor/Full frame capture ratio [1]
Key frame every [100] frames.
Video Compressor [Auto Select Strongly Recommended!]
Frame compress quality [75%]

Also um mines is Licensed maybe thats why, demo users lag more… IDK.

Read full topic
